summary: ROUGH IDLE. THE VEHICLE IDLES LOW CAUSING A VERY ROUGH IDLE. DOES NOT HAPPEN WHEN DEFROST OR A/C IS USED BECAUSE THEY AUTOMATICALLY BUMP IDLE UP. SPENT MANY MANY HOURS AT DEALER WITH THEM ADMITTING A PROBLEM BUT UNABLE TO FIX THE PROBLEM. DOES NOT IDLE LIKE A 30,000 DOLLAR VEHICLE. DODGE HAS LOST A FUTURE CUSTOMER.           *JB
